frequent_values: All other sections of the Zoning Resolution

longest_values: All other sections of the Zoning Resolution
all other applications with no commercial or community facility use, the fee shall be based upon the number of dwelling units being proposed
For an application for one zoning lot with no more than two existing or proposed dwelling units and no commercial or community facility use
Request that the Department of City Planning verify in writing the zoning district(s) in which a property is located

frequent_values: Projects measurable in square feet (Square Footage of Total Project)
The amount of floor area shall be calculated based upon the floor area for the entire development or enlargement. Except in cases of Open Uses, the total area of the zoning lot
The area of all zoning lots in the area to be rezoned
The fee shall be based upon the area of the zoning lot, and in cases of community facility or commercial uses, the fee shall be based upon the total amount of floor area
In the case of a transfer of development rights or floor area bonus, the fee shall be based upon the amount of floor area associated with such transfer or bonus.

longest_values: Maximum of $18900. The amount of floor area shall be calculated based upon the floor area for the entire development or enlargement. Except in cases of Open Uses, the total area of the zoning lot
The fee shall be based upon the area of the zoning lot, and in cases of community facility or commercial uses, the fee shall be based upon the total amount of floor area
In the case of a transfer of development rights or floor area bonus, the fee shall be based upon the amount of floor area associated with such transfer or bonus.
